title: U.S. urges ships to stay 'as far as possible' from Iran's waters in Strait of Hormuz after boarding attempts
summary_full: The U.S. told American-flagged ships to stay "as far as possible" from Iranian waters when navigating the Strait of Hormuz amid heightened U.S.-Iran tensions.
summary_public: The U.S. told American-flagged ships to stay "as far as possible" from Iranian waters when navigating the Strait of Hormuz amid heightened U.S.-Iran tensions.

IR.label: negative
IR.evidence: Iran's waters in Strait of Hormuz after boarding attempts
